value:
$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|So...$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I see you have joined the first king,
Thrasir.$k$p$WmMPID_スラシル,ch00_18_Srasir_F_Normal,Face|All of you who live...will die by our
hands.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|They're retreating!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Follow them. They are Hel's generals,
and they surely have information
we need.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Look! They're headed for—$k$p$EFace_Pain|Is that a gate?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Yes, it is! A gate to another realm...
Just like the one in Askr that leads
to Hel.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I see... Líf was the first king of Askr.
It stands to reason that he has the
power to open gates.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Then he must have gone through this
one. Should we follow?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. We don't have a moment to
waste.$k$p$Sbs150|
